name: Mother Sera
core_wound: Was alive during The Sealing 150 years ago (this is wrong, she'd be impossibly old - CORRECTED: She's 68, her parents lived through The Sealing, she grew up hearing stories), saw her community destroyed and forgotten
wants: To preserve undercity community and history before everyone forgets
needs: To pass the torch to younger generation, to believe her suffering wasn't meaningless
voice_markers: Speaks slowly, deliberately, like every word matters
Tells stories in circular way, building to point
Uses old slang from 50 years ago
Hums old labor songs when working
contradiction: Preaches non-violence but runs weapons cache for resistance, tells people to survive but is preparing them to fight
physical_description: Black woman, white natural hair in crown of locks, face deeply lined, Gamma modifications gave her enhanced lung capacity (for toxic environments) but now has breathing problems in old age, moves slowly but with dignity, always wears old coveralls from her working days
skills: Undercity history and oral tradition keeper
flaws: Too patient - sometimes waits when action is needed
Health failing but refuses to slow down
knowledge_state_book1_start: Location of old resistance weapons and supplies
How station systems work from working on them decades ago

relationships.Jax Varro: Sees his potential, becomes mentor figure, teaches him pride in being Gamma
relationships.Finn: Knew their mother, protective of them
relationships.Elara Quinn: Deeply suspicious, tests her repeatedly, eventually accepts her with conditions
relationships.The Undercity: Matriarch and memory keeper, everyone comes to her for wisdom
